name: AddEventToLumaCalendar
description:
Add an existing event to the Luma calendar.

Use this tool to add an existing event from Luma or another platform to the Luma calendar without managing it there. Useful for integrating events across platforms.

parameters.name: event_details_json
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the event to add. It should include event identifiers and necessary attributes.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Luma API.
